thread.title: BRIEF-Prologis to acquire DCT Industrial Trust for $8.4 bln

title: BRIEF-Prologis to acquire DCT Industrial Trust for $8.4 bln
text:
April 29, 2018 / 7:59 PM / Updated 34 minutes ago BRIEF-Prologis to acquire DCT Industrial Trust for $8.4 bln Reuters Staff
April 29 (Reuters) - Prologis Inc:
* PROLOGIS TO ACQUIRE DCT INDUSTRIAL TRUST FOR $8.4 BILLION
* PROLOGIS WILL ACQUIRE DCT FOR $8.4 BILLION IN A STOCK-FOR-STOCK TRANSACTION, INCLUDING ASSUMPTION OF DEBT
* UNDER TERMS OF AGREEMENT, DCT SHAREHOLDERS WILL RECEIVE 1.02 PROLOGIS SHARES FOR EACH DCT SHARE THEY OWN
* DEAL ANTICIPATED TO CREATE SUBSTANTIAL SYNERGIES, INCLUDING NEAR-TERM SYNERGIES OF ABOUT $80 MILLION IN ADMINISTRATIVE COST SAVINGS
* BOARDS OF DIRECTORS OF BOTH COMPANIES HAVE UNANIMOUSLY APPROVED TRANSACTION. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
